name: Curse of the Magpie
description:
Story

Having led a greedy life, your soul has been cursed by Odin, who has sent one of his ravens, Hugin, to watch over you.. 

You have been transformed into a thieving Magpie, and the only way for you to escape this terrible fate is to buy your soul free with gold.

Controls

Move mouse: The magpie will follow your mouse up and down.

Left-click: Activate swoop attack to steal valuables.

Right-click: Drop random item, in order to escape the scene in time.

Gameplay

Collect valuables from people on the streets, some carry pocket-watches, medals or necklaces.

When you fly high, the valuables give off glinting reflections, making it easy to spot them.

You must swoop down, open your beak and aim well, in order to collect an item. But make sure you don't steal too much at once, or you might plummet to your death!

If you fly into people while not in swoop-mode, you lose 2 second of your time.

If the timer goes to zero, you will lose a life.

For each item you carry you will have a harder time maneuvering.

At any time, you can fly upwards to flee the scene with you loot, and go back to Hugin to buy upgrades.
